incidents.title: Alert noise after new IDS rule
incidents.desc: Spike in IDS alerts post new rule set. Narrow rule scope, allowlist known subnets, post-change review.

incidents.title: Unauthorized admin login attempts
incidents.desc: Multiple failed admin logins from foreign ASN. Enforced MFA, temp IP block, rotated creds, reviewed logs.

incidents.title: Backup job failure on WS2016-DB01
incidents.desc: Nightly backup exit code 1. Check quota, restart agent, rerun incremental; full backup planned.
